name: Solarpunk Taskforce Dev
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'set -e; corepack enable; corepack prepare pnpm@latest --activate; npm install -g supabase; pnpm install; if [ -n "$SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN" ]; then supabase login --token "$SUPABASE_ACCESS_TOKEN"; fi; mkdir -p src/lib; if [ -n "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF" ]; then supabase gen types typescript --project-ref "$SUPABASE_PROJECT_REF" > src/lib/database.types.ts || true; fi'
